thread.title: Mario Balotelli facing legal action from former lover for allegedly posting intimate images on Facebook
thread.title_full: Mario Balotelli facing legal action from former lover for allegedly posting intimate images on Facebook

title: Mario Balotelli facing legal action from former lover for allegedly posting intimate images on Facebook
text:
Mario Balotelli facing legal action from former lover for allegedly posting intimate images on Facebook 
Independent.ie Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Mario Balotelli is facing legal action from one of his former lovers who claims he uploaded intimate images of her to his Facebook account. 
...
